column4: E High St at S Hanover Ave.
Russell Cave Rd near Greenwich Pike
The NWS has issued a winter weather advisory in effect from November 30 at 4 p.m. to December 1 at 7 a.m.
Use added caution, slow down, and increase following distances.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
